author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Shahid Kapoor: Pic: Shahid Kapoor and wife Mira caught twinning on their dinner date | Hindi Movie News - Times of India
text:
Shahid Kapoor might be neck-deep in the promotional activities of his upcoming release 'Rangoon'. However, he showed once again that for him, family comes before work. 

Did Kangana Ranaut just compare Shahid Kapoor with Hrithik Roshan? 
The caring husband that he is, Shahid made sure that he took time out of his hectic promotional schedule to enjoy some we-time with his wife Mira. The duo was spotted exiting a popular eatery in Bandra, Mumbai on Saturday night. And since it's Shahid and Mira we're talking about, of course, they walked out hand-in-hand as the shutterbugs had a field day clicking their pictures. But it wasn't their hand-in-hand pose that made us go 'aww' - instead, it was their attire. 



Shahid and Mira were all for twinning as the two sported denims and white tees on their dinner date. While the 'Haider' actor kept it casual with a pair of glasses, Mira sported a high pony and a no-makeup look. Don't the two look adorable? 



Baby girls are wonderful and amazing: Shahid on daughter Misha 03:07
